select z.light_type, (select coalesce(d.repair_desc, '') from gy_light_repair c , gy_light_repair_part d where c.light_no = z.light_no and c.light_no = d.light_no ORDER BY d.last_update DESC LIMIT 1) as repair_desc , (select coalesce(to_char(last_update, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') from gy_light_repair c , gy_light_repair_part d where c.light_no = z.light_no and c.light_no = d.light_no ORDER BY d.last_update DESC LIMIT 1) as last_update , z.light_no, z.pole_no, coalesce(z.hj_dong_cd, '') as hj_dong_cd, coalesce(z.bj_dong_cd, '') as bj_dong_cd, coalesce(z.new_address, '') as new_address, coalesce(z.address, '') as address, coalesce(z.map_x_pos_gl, '0') as map_x_pos, coalesce(z.map_y_pos_gl, '0') as map_y_pos, coalesce(z.kepco_cust_no, '') as kepco_cust_no, coalesce(z.stand_cd, '') as stand_cd, F_GY_DATA_CODE_NM('08', z.stand_cd) as stand_nm, coalesce(z.lamp2_cd, '') as lamp2_cd, coalesce(z.lamp3_cd, '') as lamp3_cd, coalesce(z.auto_jum_type1_cd, '') as auto_jum_type1_cd, coalesce(z.lamp1_cd, '') as lamp1_cd, coalesce(bdj, '') as bdj, coalesce(up_lighter, '') as up_lighter, coalesce(z.light_gubun, '') as light_gubun from (select light_type, light_no, pole_no, hj_dong_cd, bj_dong_cd, address, map_x_pos_gl, map_y_pos_gl, new_address, kepco_cust_no, stand_cd, lamp2_cd, lamp3_cd, auto_jum_type1_cd, lamp1_cd, bdj, up_lighter, light_gubun from gy_light
where light_gubun in ('1','2','3')
AND LIGHT_TYPE = #{lightGn}
AND elec_no != 'gumi'
and new_address like '%'||#{dongNm}||'%'
AND hj_dong_cd = #{area}
AND hj_dong_cd = #{area2}
and new_address like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and address like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and light_no like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and map_x_pos_gl BETWEEN #{minX} and #{maxX} and map_y_pos_gl BETWEEN #{minY} and #{maxY}
where light_no like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where kepco_cust_no like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and light_gubun != '9' ) z order by z.light_no asc
